4728.verse: أَتَوَاصَوْاْ بِهِۦ‌ۚ|Have they transmitted it to them?|247|260|16157$بَلْ|Nay,|50|75|848$هُمْ|they|50|75|49$قَوْمٌ|(are) a people|114|139|4788$طَاغُونَ|transgressing.|113|126|16158$

4731.verse: وَمَا|And not|72|106|46$خَلَقْتُ|I have created|118|186|14901$ٱلْجِنَّ|the jinn|70|138|5898$وَٱلْإِنسَ|and the mankind|129|197|16160$إِلَّا|except|65|99|86$لِيَعْبُدُونِ|that they worship Me.|167|167|16161$

4734.verse: فَإِنَّ|So indeed,|90|107|599$لِلَّذِينَ|for those who|112|146|750$ظَلَمُواْ|do wrong,|86|120|558$ذَنُوبًا|(is) a portion|106|140|16166$مِّثْلَ|like|57|91|1052$ذَنُوبِ|(the) portion|105|122|16167$أَصْحَـٰبِهِمْ|(of) their companions,|167|298|16168$فَلَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونِ|so let them not ask Me to hasten.|247|378|16169$

4742.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|108|58$عَذَابَ|(the) punishment|134|209|1786$رَبِّكَ|(of) your Lord|112|187|1322$لَوَٲقِعٌ|(will) surely occur.|143|181|16111$

4744.verse: يَوْمَ|(On the) Day|107|148|1057$تَمُورُ|will shake|83|166|16181$ٱلسَّمَآءُ|the heaven|95|178|12745$مَوْرًا|(with violent) shake|152|193|16182$

4745.verse: وَتَسِيرُ|And will move away,|155|208|16183$ٱلْجِبَالُ|the mountains|114|220|9461$سَيْرًا|(with an awful) movement|194|247|16184$

4727.verse: Similarly, there came not to those before them any messenger except that they said, "A magician or a madman."

4728.verse: Did they suggest it to them? Rather, they [themselves] are a transgressing people.

4729.verse: So leave them, [O Muhammad], for you are not to be blamed.

4730.verse: And remind, for indeed, the reminder benefits the believers.

4731.verse: And I did not create the jinn and mankind except to worship Me.

4732.verse: I do not want from them any provision, nor do I want them to feed Me.

4733.verse: Indeed, it is Allah who is the [continual] Provider, the firm possessor of strength.

4734.verse: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a portion [of punishment] like the portion of their predecessors, so let them not impatiently urge Me.

4735.verse: And woe to those who have disbelieved from their Day which they are promised.

4742.verse: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will occur.

4743.verse: Of it there is no preventer.

4744.verse: On the Day the heaven will sway with circular motion

4745.verse: And the mountains will pass on, departing -

4746.verse: Then woe, that Day, to the deniers,

4747.verse: Who are in [empty] discourse amusing themselves.

4748.verse: The Day they are thrust toward the fire of Hell with a [violent] thrust, [its angels will say],

4749.verse: "This is the Fire which you used to deny.
